revised_title: Phyto-Palaeontological Investigations of the Fossil Flora of Alum Bay
tldr: The author investigates the fossil flora of Alum Bay, identifying at least 116 genera and 274 species. The findings suggest a sub-tropical climate and close connections between the Alum Bay and Sheppey floras. The study also highlights the presence of ancestral species and the evolution of various plant genera over time.
